headline: PayPal's blockchain partner accidentally minted $300 trillion in stablecoins
summary: In an embarrassing error, PayPal blockchain partner Paxos accidentally minted 300 trillion of the PYUSD token today.

headline: Paxos Accidentally Mints $300 Trillion in PYUSD Stablecoins
summary: Paxos’ $300 trillion PYUSD minting error exposes critical flaws in stablecoin safeguards and proof-of-reserve systems.

headline: Printing Money: Paxos Mints, Then Burns $300 Trillion in PayPal Stablecoins
summary: A fat-finger mistake, or a hack? Crypto traders are confounded after $300 trillion worth of PayPal's PYUSD was minted and then burned.

headline: PayPal Alerts Consumers to Phishing Scams and Encourages Safety Tips
summary: As trusted leaders in customer protection, PayPal Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: PYPL) is committed to fighting continually evolving scams. With National Cybersecurity Awareness Month underway, the company is spreading awareness of phishing scams in which fraudsters impersonate well-known brands and use social engineering tactics to deceive people into sending money and divulging personal information. PayPal urges all consumers to practice vigilance and learn how to spot the signs of phishing fraud.

headline: Synchrony Financial’s (NYSE:SYF) Q3: Beats On Revenue
summary: Consumer financial services company Synchrony Financial (NYSE:SYF) reported revenue ahead of Wall Street’s expectations in Q3 CY2025, but sales were flat year on year at $3.82 billion. Its GAAP profit of $2.86 per share was 28.9% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: 1 Volatile Stock to Target This Week and 2 We Turn Down
summary: Market swings can be tough to stomach, and volatile stocks often experience exaggerated moves in both directions. While many thrive during risk-on environments, many also struggle to maintain investor confidence when the ride gets bumpy.
